timeline.bodyText: Add a comment that the string returned is not considered stable and cannot be used for other reasons than debugging.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: If we're going to do that here, we should probably put that everywhere, since I think we want that to be true across the board. I wonder if we should just put this somewhere in our docs, rather than put it on all the methods?
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: I'll add a line to the CONTRIBUTING PR that I just opened.
replies.author: jkwatson
